title: thagumO muraiyO
sahitya: tagumO! muRaiyO! dharumam tAnO!! undanmagan nAn ena nI uNarndum parAmugam  anupallavi  pagaivarkkum aruLum perum tagai nI anRO!vagai aRiyA ennaik kAppAdum un paNiyanRO!  caraNam  nigamAgamangaLil niRaindavaL nIyE!nagai muga naLina shrIranjani nIyE!akhilamellAm unadu arasATciyE!ika para nalam peRa aruLvAy tAyE!
